field.label: Enter the name of the file
field.required: You must enter a title for the file.

field.label: Enter a description for the file
Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Patent use
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Description to Patent use
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments for patetent use in this box.

field.label: Impact pathway notes (Why is it relevant to impact pathway?)
Application no.
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Name(s) of applicant(s), Name(s) of grantee(s) or of the holder(s)
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Date of filing the application
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Organization name
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Acronym or short form of title
Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Description of project/targets in plan language
Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Description of project/targets in plan language
Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item in the form Surname, Firstname [i.e. Smith, Josh or Smith, J].

field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.required: You must enter at least the year.
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the name of any sponsors.

field.label: Project
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this publication.

field.label: Journal
field.required: You need to insert the journal name as you are submitting a Journal Article
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal where the item has been published, if any.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Enter the name of the conference where the item has been presented, if any.

field.label: Dataset
field.hint: Link the item to one or more existent dataset in the repository used or described by the publication or, put here the dataset citation

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Key information/name
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Spin-off type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item.

field.label: Impact pathway notes (Why is it relevant to impact pathway?)
Register type
field.hint: Select type of register of companies, cooperatives, partnerships and associations

field.label: Title of the event
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Purposes of the activity
field.hint: Please select one or several purposes of the activity

field.hint: Which groups of actors are involved?

field.label: Details to the involved group of actors
field.hint: e.g. specific subgroups, number of participants

field.label: corresponding target group

field.label: Main contribution to project / aim of cooperation

field.hint: Which project partners or other cooperation partners are involved in the activity?

field.hint: Please briefly describe the most important topics of the cooperation activity.

pair.stored-value: project design - work on design of the test / experiment / investigation

pair.stored-value: research process - integrate knowledge from different disciplines

pair.stored-value: research process - integrate feedback and knowledge from practice

pair.stored-value: research process - reflection on research processes

pair.stored-value: research process - reflection/validation of research results

pair.stored-value: transfer - reflexion on usability and use of results

pair.displayed-value: consult - actors are asked for their opinion or consult the project
pair.stored-value: consult - actors are asked for their opinion or consult the project

pair.displayed-value: involved - actors are integrated into mutual exchange processes without participating in decision-making processes
pair.stored-value: involved - actors are integrated into mutual exchange processes without participating in decision-making processes

pair.displayed-value: collaborate - actors are involved in exchange processes and have an influence on decisions
pair.stored-value: collaborate - actors are involved in exchange processes and have an influence on decisions

pair.displayed-value: empowered - acors exclusively shape decision-making processes
